name: Keeping It Meta 01
tagline: Keeping it Meta with Metatron: Episode 01
body: ### Metatron Rules You. Only the grooves and contemplation of our supreme amorphous ruler can satiate the anxiety brought on by your modern condition. Ready your mind for transformation as we the navigate the crossroads between our material existence and the dreams that live outside of us.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
